00098 #include "midas.h"
00099 #include "msystem.h"
00100 #include "ybos.h"
00101 #include "mrpc.h"
00102 
00103 #define  REP_HEADER    1
00104 #define  REP_RECORD    2
00105 #define  REP_LENGTH    3
00106 #define  REP_EVENT     4
00107 #define  REP_BANKLIST  5
00108 
00109 char bank_name[4], sbank_name[4], svpath[128];
00110 INT hBufEvent;
00111 INT save_dsp = 1, evt_display = 0;
00112 INT speed = 0, dsp_time = 0, dsp_fmt = 0, dsp_mode = 0, file_mode, bl = -1;
00113 INT consistency = 0, disp_bank_list = 0;
00114 BOOL via_callback;
00115 INT i, data_fmt, count;
00116 KEY key;
00117 HNDLE hSubkey;
00118 INT event_id, event_msk;
00119 typedef struct {
00120    WORD id;
00121    WORD msk;
00122    WORD fmt;
00123    char Fmt[8];
00124    char Eqname[256];
00125 } FMT_ID;
00126 
00127 FMT_ID eq[32];
00128 
00129 /*-------- Check data format ------------*/
00130 DWORD data_format_check(EVENT_HEADER * pevent, INT * i)
00131 {
00132 
00133    INT jj, ii;
00134    BOOL dupflag = FALSE;
00135 
00136    /* check in the active FE list for duplicate event ID */
00137    ii = 0;
00138    while (eq[ii].fmt) {
00139       jj = ii + 1;
00140       /* problem occur when duplicate ID with different data format */
00141       while (eq[jj].fmt) {
00142          if ((eq[jj].fmt != eq[ii].fmt)
00143              && (eq[jj].id == eq[ii].id)
00144              && (eq[jj].msk == eq[ii].msk)
00145              && eq[ii].id != 0) {
00146             printf("Duplicate eventID[%d] between Eq:%s & %s  ", eq[jj].id, eq[jj].Eqname,
00147                    eq[ii].Eqname);
00148             printf("Dumping event in raw format\n");
00149             dupflag = TRUE;
00150          }
00151          jj++;
00152       }
00153       ii++;
00154    }
00155    if (data_fmt != 0) {
00156       *i = 0;
00157       strcpy(eq[*i].Fmt, "GIVEN");
00158       return data_fmt;
00159    } else {
00160       *i = 0;
00161       if (dupflag)
00162          strcpy(eq[*i].Fmt, "DUPLICATE");
00163       else {
00164          do {
00165             if (pevent->event_id == eq[*i].id)
00166                return eq[*i].fmt;
00167             (*i)++;
00168          } while (eq[*i].fmt);
00169       }
00170    }
00171    return 0;
00172 }
00173 
00174 /*----- Replog function ----------------------------------------*/
00175 int replog(int data_fmt, char *rep_file, int bl, int action)
00176 {
00177    char banklist[YB_STRING_BANKLIST_MAX];
00178    short int msk, id;
00179    BOOL bank_found = FALSE;
00180    INT status = 0, i;
00181    DWORD physize, evtlen;
00182    void *physrec;
00183    char *pmyevt;
00184    EVENT_HEADER *pme;
00185    BANK_HEADER *pmbkh;
00186    YBOS_BANK_HEADER *pybk;
00187    DWORD *pdata;
00188    DWORD bklen, bktyp;
00189 
00190    /* open data file */
00191    if (yb_any_file_ropen(rep_file, data_fmt) != SS_SUCCESS)
00192       return (-1);
00193 
00194    switch (action) {
00195    case REP_HEADER:
00196    case REP_RECORD:
00197       /* get only physical record header */
00198       if (yb_any_physrec_skip(data_fmt, bl) != YB_SUCCESS)
00199          return (-1);
00200       do {
00201          if (action == REP_HEADER)
00202             status = yb_any_all_info_display(D_HEADER);
00203          else if (action == REP_RECORD)
00204             status = yb_any_physrec_display(data_fmt);
00205          if ((status == YB_DONE) || (bl != -1))
00206             break;
00207       }
00208       while (yb_any_physrec_get(data_fmt, &physrec, &physize) == YB_SUCCESS);
00209       break;
00210 
00211    case REP_LENGTH:
00212    case REP_EVENT:
00213    case REP_BANKLIST:
00214       /* skip will read atleast on record */
00215       if (yb_any_physrec_skip(data_fmt, bl) != YB_SUCCESS)
00216          return (-1);
00217       i = 0;
00218       while (yb_any_event_get(data_fmt, (void **) &pmyevt, &evtlen) == YB_SUCCESS) {
00219          status = yb_any_event_swap(data_fmt, pmyevt);
00220          if (file_mode != YB_NO_RECOVER)
00221             if ((status =
00222                  yb_file_recompose(pmyevt, data_fmt, svpath, file_mode)) != YB_SUCCESS)
00223                printf("mdump recompose error %i\n", status);
00224          if (action == REP_LENGTH)
00225             status = yb_any_all_info_display(D_EVTLEN);
00226          if (action == REP_BANKLIST) {
00227             if (data_fmt == FORMAT_YBOS)
00228                status = ybk_list((DWORD *) pmyevt, banklist);
00229             else if (data_fmt == FORMAT_MIDAS) {
00230                pme = (EVENT_HEADER *) pmyevt;
00231                if (pme->event_id == EVENTID_BOR ||
00232                    pme->event_id == EVENTID_EOR || pme->event_id == EVENTID_MESSAGE)
00233                   continue;
00234                printf
00235                    ("Evid:%4.4hx- Mask:%4.4hx- Serial:%ld- Time:0x%lx- Dsize:%ld/0x%lx\n",
00236                     pme->event_id, pme->trigger_mask, pme->serial_number, pme->time_stamp,
00237                     pme->data_size, pme->data_size);
00238                pmbkh = (BANK_HEADER *) (((EVENT_HEADER *) pmyevt) + 1);
00239                status = bk_list(pmbkh, banklist);
00240             }
00241             printf("#banks:%i Bank list:-%s-\n", status, banklist);
00242          } else if ((action == REP_EVENT) && (event_id == EVENTID_ALL) && (event_msk == TRIGGER_ALL) && (sbank_name[0] == 0)) { /* a quick by-pass to prevent bank search if not necessary */
00243             printf
00244                 ("------------------------ Event# %i --------------------------------\n",
00245                  i++);
00246             yb_any_event_display(pmyevt, data_fmt, dsp_mode, dsp_fmt);
00247          } else if (action == REP_EVENT) {
00248             id = EVENTID_ALL;
00249             msk = TRIGGER_ALL;
00250             if (data_fmt == FORMAT_MIDAS) {
00251                pme = (EVENT_HEADER *) pmyevt;
00252                id = pme->event_id;
00253                msk = pme->trigger_mask;
00254                /* Search bank if necessary */
00255                if (sbank_name[0] != 0) {        /* bank name given through argument list */
00256                   bank_found = FALSE;
00257                   pmbkh = (BANK_HEADER *) (((EVENT_HEADER *) pmyevt) + 1);
00258                   if ((pmbkh->data_size + 8) == ((EVENT_HEADER *) pmyevt)->data_size) {
00259                      if ((status = bk_find(pmbkh, sbank_name, &bklen, &bktyp, (void *) &pybk)) == SS_SUCCESS) { /* given bank found in list */
00260                         status = bk_list(pmbkh, banklist);
00261                         bank_found = TRUE;
00262                      }
00263                   }
00264                }
00265             } else if (data_fmt == FORMAT_YBOS) {
00266                /* check id EVID found in event for id and msk selection */
00267                if ((status =
00268                     ybk_find((DWORD *) pmyevt, "EVID", &bklen, &bktyp,
00269                              (void *) &pybk)) == YB_SUCCESS) {
00270                   pdata = (DWORD *) ((YBOS_BANK_HEADER *) pybk + 1);
00271                   id = (short int) (YBOS_EVID_EVENT_ID(pdata));
00272                   msk = (short int) (YBOS_EVID_TRIGGER_MASK(pdata));
00273                }
00274                /* Search bank if necessary */
00275                if (sbank_name[0] != 0) {        /* bank name given through argument list */
00276                   bank_found = FALSE;
00277                   if ((status = ybk_find((DWORD *) pmyevt, sbank_name, &bklen, &bktyp, (void *) &pybk)) == YB_SUCCESS) {        /* given bank found in list */
00278                      status = ybk_list((DWORD *) pmyevt, banklist);
00279                      bank_found = TRUE;
00280                   }
00281                }
00282             }
00283             /* check user request through switch setting (id, msk ,bank) */
00284             if ((event_msk != TRIGGER_ALL) || (event_id != EVENTID_ALL) || (sbank_name[0] != 0)) {      /* check request or skip event if not satisfied */
00285                if (((event_id != EVENTID_ALL) && (id != event_id)) ||   /* id check ==> skip */
00286                    ((event_msk != TRIGGER_ALL) && (msk != event_msk)) ||        /* msk check ==> skip */
00287                    ((sbank_name[0] != 0) && !bank_found)) {     /* bk check ==> skip *//* skip event */
00288                   printf("Searching for Bank -%s- Skiping event...%i\r", sbank_name, i++);
00289                   fflush(stdout);
00290                } else {         /* request match ==> display any event */
00291                   printf
00292                       ("------------------------ Event# %i --------------------------------\n",
00293                        i++);
00294                   yb_any_event_display(pmyevt, data_fmt, dsp_mode, dsp_fmt);
00295                }
00296             } else {            /* no user request ==> display any event */
00297                printf
00298                    ("------------------------ Event# %i --------------------------------\n",
00299                     i++);
00300                yb_any_event_display(pmyevt, data_fmt, dsp_mode, dsp_fmt);
00301             }
00302          }
00303       }
00304       break;
00305    }                            /* switch */
00306 
00307    /* close data file */
00308    yb_any_file_rclose(data_fmt);
00309    return 0;
00310 }
00311 
00312 /*----- receive_event ----------------------------------------------*/
00313 void process_event(HNDLE hBuf, HNDLE request_id, EVENT_HEADER * pheader, void *pevent)
00314 {
00315    static char bars[] = "|/-\\";
00316    static int i_bar;
00317    static EVENT_HEADER pevh;
00318    INT internal_data_fmt, status, index, size;
00319    DWORD *plrl, *pybk, bklen, bktyp;
00320    char banklist[YB_STRING_BANKLIST_MAX];
00321    BANK *pmbk;
00322    BANK_HEADER *pmbh;
00323 
00324    if (speed == 1) {
00325       /* accumulate received event size */
00326       size = pheader->data_size + sizeof(EVENT_HEADER);
00327       count += size;
00328       return;
00329    }
00330    if (consistency == 1) {
00331       if (pheader->serial_number != pevh.serial_number + 1) {
00332          /* event header */
00333          printf
00334              ("\nLast - Evid:%4.4hx- Mask:%4.4hx- Serial:%li- Time:0x%lx- Dsize:%li/0x%lx\n",
00335               pevh.event_id, pevh.trigger_mask, pevh.serial_number, pevh.time_stamp,
00336               pevh.data_size, pevh.data_size);
00337          printf
00338              ("Now  - Evid:%4.4hx- Mask:%4.4hx- Serial:%li- Time:0x%lx- Dsize:%li/0x%lx\n",
00339               pheader->event_id, pheader->trigger_mask, pheader->serial_number,
00340               pheader->time_stamp, pheader->data_size, pheader->data_size);
00341       } else {
00342          printf("Consistency check: %c - %li\r", bars[i_bar++ % 4],
00343                 pheader->serial_number);
00344          fflush(stdout);
00345       }
00346       memcpy((char *) &pevh, (char *) pheader, sizeof(EVENT_HEADER));
00347       return;
00348    }
00349    if (evt_display > 0) {
00350       evt_display--;
00351 
00352       internal_data_fmt = data_format_check(pheader, &index);
00353 
00354       /* pointer to data section */
00355       plrl = (DWORD *) pevent;
00356       pmbh = (BANK_HEADER *) pevent;
00357 
00358       /* display header comes ALWAYS from MIDAS header */
00359       printf("------------------------ Event# %i ------------------------\n",
00360              save_dsp - evt_display);
00361       /* selection based on data format */
00362       if ((internal_data_fmt == FORMAT_YBOS) && (yb_any_event_swap(FORMAT_YBOS, plrl) >= YB_SUCCESS)) { /* ---- YBOS FMT ---- */
00363          if (file_mode != YB_NO_RECOVER)
00364             if ((status =
00365                  yb_file_recompose(pevent, internal_data_fmt, svpath,
00366                                    file_mode)) != YB_SUCCESS)
00367                printf("mdump recompose error %i\n", status);
00368          if (sbank_name[0] != 0) {      /* bank name given through argument list */
00369             if ((status = ybk_find(plrl, sbank_name, &bklen, &bktyp, (void *) &pybk)) == YB_SUCCESS) {  /* given bank found in list */
00370                status = ybk_list(plrl, banklist);
00371                printf("#banks:%i Bank list:-%s-\n", status, banklist);
00372                printf("Bank:%s - Length (I*4):%li - Type:%li - pBk:%p\n", sbank_name,
00373                       bklen, bktyp, pybk);
00374                yb_any_bank_display(NULL, pybk, FORMAT_YBOS, dsp_mode, dsp_fmt);
00375             } else {
00376                status = ybk_list(plrl, banklist);
00377                printf("Bank -%s- not found (%i) in ", sbank_name, status);
00378                printf("#banks:%i Bank list:-%s-\n", status, banklist);
00379             }
00380          } else {               /* Full event */
00381             /* event header */
00382             printf("Evid:%4.4hx- Mask:%4.4hx- Serial:%ld- Time:0x%lx- Dsize:%ld/0x%lx\n",
00383                    pheader->event_id, pheader->trigger_mask, pheader->serial_number,
00384                    pheader->time_stamp, pheader->data_size, pheader->data_size);
00385 
00386             if (disp_bank_list) {
00387                status = ybk_list(plrl, banklist);
00388                printf("#banks:%i Bank list:-%s-\n", status, banklist);
00389             } else
00390                yb_any_event_display(plrl, FORMAT_YBOS, dsp_mode, dsp_fmt);
00391          }
00392       } else if ((internal_data_fmt == FORMAT_MIDAS) && (yb_any_event_swap(FORMAT_MIDAS, pheader) >= YB_SUCCESS)) {     /* ---- MIDAS FMT ---- */
00393          if (file_mode != YB_NO_RECOVER)
00394             status = yb_file_recompose(pheader, internal_data_fmt, svpath, file_mode);
00395          if (sbank_name[0] != 0) {
00396             if (bk_find(pmbh, sbank_name, &bklen, &bktyp, (void *) &pmbk) == SS_SUCCESS) {      /* bank name given through argument list */
00397                status = bk_list(pmbh, banklist);
00398                printf("#banks:%i Bank list:-%s-", status, banklist);
00399                yb_any_bank_display(pmbh, pmbk, FORMAT_MIDAS, dsp_mode, dsp_fmt);
00400             } else {
00401                status = bk_list(pmbh, banklist);
00402                printf("Bank -%s- not found (%i) in ", sbank_name, status);
00403                printf("#banks:%i Bank list:-%s-\n", status, banklist);
00404             }
00405          } else {               /* Full event or bank list only */
00406             if (disp_bank_list) {
00407                /* event header */
00408                printf
00409                    ("Evid:%4.4hx- Mask:%4.4hx- Serial:%ld- Time:0x%lx- Dsize:%ld/0x%lx\n",
00410                     pheader->event_id, pheader->trigger_mask, pheader->serial_number,
00411                     pheader->time_stamp, pheader->data_size, pheader->data_size);
00412                status = bk_list(pmbh, banklist);
00413                printf("#banks:%i Bank list:-%s-\n", status, banklist);
00414             } else
00415                yb_any_event_display(pheader, FORMAT_MIDAS, dsp_mode, dsp_fmt);
00416          }
00417       } else {                  /* unknown format just dump midas event */
00418          printf("Data format not supported: %s\n", eq[index].Fmt);
00419          yb_any_event_display(pheader, FORMAT_MIDAS, DSP_RAW, dsp_fmt);
00420       }
00421       if (evt_display == 0) {
00422          cm_disconnect_experiment();
00423          exit(0);
00424       }
00425       if (dsp_time != 0)
00426          ss_sleep(dsp_time);
00427    }
00428    return;
00429 }
00430 
00431 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00432 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00433 {
00434    HNDLE hDB, hKey;
00435    char host_name[HOST_NAME_LENGTH], expt_name[NAME_LENGTH], str[80];
00436    char buf_name[32] = EVENT_BUFFER_NAME, rep_file[128];
00437    double rate;
00438    unsigned int status, start_time, stop_time;
00439    BOOL debug = FALSE, rep_flag;
00440    INT ch, request_id, size, get_flag, action, i;
00441    BUFFER_HEADER buffer_header;
00442 
00443    /* set default */
00444    host_name[0] = 0;
00445    expt_name[0] = 0;
00446    sbank_name[0] = 0;
00447    svpath[0] = 0;
00448    rep_file[0] = 0;
00449    event_id = EVENTID_ALL;
00450    event_msk = TRIGGER_ALL;
00451    evt_display = 1;
00452    get_flag = GET_SOME;
00453    dsp_fmt = DSP_UNK;
00454    dsp_mode = DSP_BANK;
00455    file_mode = YB_NO_RECOVER;
00456    via_callback = TRUE;
00457    rep_flag = FALSE;
00458    dsp_time = 0;
00459    speed = 0;
00460    consistency = 0;
00461    action = REP_EVENT;
00462 
00463    /* Get if existing the pre-defined experiment */
00464    cm_get_environment(host_name, sizeof(host_name), expt_name, sizeof(expt_name));
00465 
00466    /* scan arg list for -x which specify the replog configuration */
00467    for (i = 1; i < argc; i++) {
00468       if (strncmp(argv[i], "-x", 2) == 0) {
00469          if (i + 1 == argc)
00470             goto repusage;
00471          if (strncmp(argv[++i], "online", 6) != 0) {
00472             rep_flag = TRUE;
00473             break;
00474          }
00475       }
00476    }
00477    if (rep_flag) {
00478       /* get Replay argument list */
00479       data_fmt = 0;
00480       for (i = 1; i < argc; i++) {
00481          if (argv[i][0] == '-' && argv[i][1] == 'd')
00482             debug = TRUE;
00483          else if (argv[i][0] == '-') {
00484             if (i + 1 >= argc || argv[i + 1][0] == '-')
00485                goto repusage;
00486             if (strncmp(argv[i], "-t", 2) == 0) {
00487                sprintf(str, argv[++i]);
00488                if (strncmp(str, "m", 1) == 0)
00489                   data_fmt = FORMAT_MIDAS;
00490                if (strncmp(str, "y", 1) == 0)
00491                   data_fmt = FORMAT_YBOS;
00492             } else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-b", 2) == 0)
00493                strncpy(sbank_name, argv[++i], 4);
00494             else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-i", 2) == 0)
00495                event_id = atoi(argv[++i]);
00496             else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-k", 2) == 0)
00497                event_msk = atoi(argv[++i]);
00498             else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-m", 2) == 0) {
00499                sprintf(str, argv[++i]);
00500                if (strncmp(str, "r", 1) == 0)
00501                   dsp_mode = DSP_RAW;
00502                if (strncmp(str, "b", 1) == 0)
00503                   dsp_mode = DSP_BANK;
00504             } else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-w", 2) == 0) {
00505                sprintf(str, argv[++i]);
00506                if (strncmp(str, "h", 1) == 0)
00507                   action = REP_HEADER;
00508                else if (strncmp(str, "r", 1) == 0)
00509                   action = REP_RECORD;
00510                else if (strncmp(str, "l", 1) == 0)
00511                   action = REP_LENGTH;
00512                else if (strncmp(str, "e", 1) == 0)
00513                   action = REP_EVENT;
00514                else if (strncmp(str, "j", 1) == 0)
00515                   action = REP_BANKLIST;
00516             } else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-p", 2) == 0)
00517                strcpy(svpath, argv[++i]);
00518             else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-c", 2) == 0) {
00519                strcpy(str, argv[++i]);
00520                if (strncmp(str, "n", 1) == 0 || strncmp(str, "N", 1) == 0)
00521                   file_mode = YB_NO_RUN;
00522                if (strncmp(str, "a", 1) == 0 || strncmp(str, "A", 1) == 0)
00523                   file_mode = YB_ADD_RUN;
00524             } else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-f", 2) == 0) {
00525                sprintf(str, argv[++i]);
00526                if (strncmp(str, "d", 1) == 0)
00527                   dsp_fmt = DSP_DEC;
00528                if (strncmp(str, "x", 1) == 0)
00529                   dsp_fmt = DSP_HEX;
00530                if (strncmp(str, "a", 1) == 0)
00531                   dsp_fmt = DSP_ASC;
00532             } else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-r", 2) == 0)
00533                bl = atoi(argv[++i]);
00534             else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-x", 2) == 0) {
00535                if (i + 1 == argc)
00536                   goto repusage;
00537                strcpy(rep_file, argv[++i]);
00538             } else {
00539              repusage:
00540                printf("mdump for replay  -x file name    : file to inspect\n");
00541                printf
00542                    ("                  -m mode         : Display mode either Bank or raw\n");
00543                printf
00544                    ("                  -b bank name    : search for bank name (case sensitive)\n");
00545                printf("                  -i evt_id (any) : event id from the FE\n");
00546                printf
00547                    ("                  -k mask (any)   : trigger_mask from FE setting\n");
00548                printf
00549                    (">>> -i and -k are valid for YBOS ONLY if EVID bank is present in the event\n");
00550                printf
00551                    ("                  -w what         : Header, Record, Length, Event, Jbank_list\n");
00552                printf
00553                    (">>> Header & Record are not supported for MIDAS as no physical record structure\n");
00554                printf
00555                    ("                  -f format (auto): data representation (x/d/ascii) def:bank header content\n");
00556                printf
00557                    ("                  -p path (null)  : path for file composition (see -c)\n");
00558                printf("                  -t type (auto)  : Bank format (Midas/Ybos)\n");
00559                printf(">>> if -x is a /dev/xxx, -t has to be specified\n");
00560                printf
00561                    ("                  -c compose      : retrieve file from event (Addrun#/Norun#)\n");
00562                printf
00563                    ("                  -r #            : skip record(YBOS) or event(MIDAS) to #\n");
00564                return 0;
00565             }
00566          }
00567       }
00568    } else {
00569       /* get parameters for online */
00570       for (i = 1; i < argc; i++) {
00571          if (argv[i][0] == '-' && argv[i][1] == 'd')
00572             debug = TRUE;
00573          else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-s", 2) == 0)
00574             speed = 1;
00575          else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-y", 2) == 0)
00576             consistency = 1;
00577          else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-j", 2) == 0)
00578             disp_bank_list = 1;
00579          else if (argv[i][0] == '-') {
00580             if (i + 1 >= argc || argv[i + 1][0] == '-')
00581                goto usage;
00582             else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-x", 2) == 0)
00583                strncpy(rep_file, argv[++i], 4);
00584             else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-b", 2) == 0)
00585                strncpy(sbank_name, argv[++i], 4);
00586             else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-l", 2) == 0)
00587                save_dsp = evt_display = atoi(argv[++i]);
00588             else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-w", 2) == 0)
00589                dsp_time = 1000 * (atoi(argv[++i]));
00590             else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-m", 2) == 0) {
00591                sprintf(str, argv[++i]);
00592                if (strncmp(str, "r", 1) == 0)
00593                   dsp_mode = DSP_RAW;
00594                if (strncmp(str, "y", 1) == 0)
00595                   dsp_mode = DSP_BANK;
00596             } else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-g", 2) == 0) {
00597                sprintf(str, argv[++i]);
00598                if (strncmp(str, "s", 1) == 0)
00599                   get_flag = GET_SOME;
00600                if (strncmp(str, "a", 1) == 0)
00601                   get_flag = GET_ALL;
00602             } else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-f", 2) == 0) {
00603                sprintf(str, argv[++i]);
00604                if (strncmp(str, "d", 1) == 0)
00605                   dsp_fmt = DSP_DEC;
00606                if (strncmp(str, "x", 1) == 0)
00607                   dsp_fmt = DSP_HEX;
00608                if (strncmp(str, "a", 1) == 0)
00609                   dsp_fmt = DSP_ASC;
00610             } else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-i", 2) == 0)
00611                event_id = atoi(argv[++i]);
00612             else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-k", 2) == 0)
00613                event_msk = atoi(argv[++i]);
00614             else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-p", 2) == 0)
00615                strcpy(svpath, argv[++i]);
00616             else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-z", 2) == 0)
00617                strcpy(buf_name, argv[++i]);
00618             else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-t", 2) == 0) {
00619                sprintf(str, argv[++i]);
00620                if (strncmp(str, "m", 1) == 0)
00621                   data_fmt = FORMAT_MIDAS;
00622                if (strncmp(str, "y", 1) == 0)
00623                   data_fmt = FORMAT_YBOS;
00624             } else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-c", 2) == 0) {
00625                strcpy(str, argv[++i]);
00626                if (strncmp(str, "n", 1) == 0 || strncmp(str, "N", 1) == 0)
00627                   file_mode = YB_NO_RUN;
00628                if (strncmp(str, "a", 1) == 0 || strncmp(str, "A", 1) == 0)
00629                   file_mode = YB_ADD_RUN;
00630             } else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-h", 2) == 0)
00631                strcpy(host_name, argv[++i]);
00632             else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-e", 2) == 0)
00633                strcpy(expt_name, argv[++i]);
00634             else {
00635              usage:
00636                printf("mdump for online  -l #            : display # events (look 1)\n");
00637                printf
00638                    ("                  -f format (auto): data representation (x/d/ascii) def:bank header content\n");
00639                printf
00640                    ("                  -p path (null)  : path for file composition (see -c)\n");
00641                printf("                  -t type (auto)  : Bank format (Midas/Ybos)\n");
00642                printf
00643                    ("                  -c compose      : retrieve file from event (Addrun#/Norun#)\n");
00644                printf
00645                    ("                  -w time         : insert wait in [sec] between each display\n");
00646                printf
00647                    ("                  -m mode         : Display mode either Bank or raw\n");
00648                printf
00649                    ("                  -j              : Display # of banks and bank name list only\n");
00650                printf
00651                    ("                  -b bank name    : search for bank name (case sensitive)\n");
00652                printf("                  -i evt_id (any) : event id from the FE\n");
00653                printf
00654                    ("                  -k mask (any)   : trigger_mask from FE setting\n");
00655                printf
00656                    (">>> -i and -k are valid for YBOS ONLY if EVID bank is present in the event\n");
00657                printf
00658                    ("                  -g type         : sampling mode either SOME or all)\n");
00659                printf(">>> in case of -c it is recommented to used -g all\n");
00660                printf
00661                    ("                  -s              : speed test for connection test\n");
00662                printf
00663                    ("                  -x Source       : Data source selection def:online (see -x -h)\n");
00664                printf
00665                    ("                  -y              : Serial number consistency check\n");
00666                printf(">>> in case of -y it is recommented to used -g all\n");
00667                printf("                  -z buffer name  : Midas buffer name(SYSTEM)\n");
00668                printf("                  [-h Hostname] [-e Experiment]\n\n");
00669                return 0;
00670             }
00671          }
00672       }
00673    }
00674 
00675    if (rep_flag && data_fmt == 0) {
00676       char *pext;
00677       if ((pext = strrchr(rep_file, '.')) != 0) {
00678          if (equal_ustring(pext + 1, "mid"))
00679             data_fmt = FORMAT_MIDAS;
00680          else if (equal_ustring(pext + 1, "ybs"))
00681             data_fmt = FORMAT_YBOS;
00682          else if (equal_ustring(pext + 1, "gz")) {
00683             if ((pext = strchr(rep_file, '.')) != 0) {
00684                if (strstr(pext + 1, "mid"))
00685                   data_fmt = FORMAT_MIDAS;
00686                else if (strstr(pext + 1, "ybs"))
00687                   data_fmt = FORMAT_YBOS;
00688             } else {
00689                printf
00690                    ("\n>>> data type (-t) should be set by hand in -x mode for tape <<< \n\n");
00691                goto usage;
00692             }
00693          } else {
00694             printf
00695                 ("\n>>> data type (-t) should be set by hand in -x mode for tape <<< \n\n");
00696             goto usage;
00697          }
00698       }
00699    }
00700    /* steer to replog function */
00701    if (rep_flag) {
00702       replog(data_fmt, rep_file, bl, action);
00703       return 0;
00704    } else
00705       /* check parameters */
00706    if (evt_display < 1 && evt_display > 1000) {
00707       printf("mdump-F- <-display arg> out of range (1:1000)\n");
00708       return -1;
00709    }
00710    if (dsp_time < 0 && dsp_time > 100) {
00711       printf("mdump-F- <-delay arg> out of range (1:100)\n");
00712       return -1;
00713    }
00714 
00715    /* connect to experiment */
00716 
00717    status = cm_connect_experiment(host_name, expt_name, "mdump", 0);
00718    if (status != CM_SUCCESS)
00719       return 1;
00720 
00721 #ifdef _DEBUG
00722    cm_set_watchdog_params(TRUE, 0);
00723 #endif
00724 
00725    /* open the "system" buffer, 1M size */
00726    status = bm_open_buffer(buf_name, EVENT_BUFFER_SIZE, &hBufEvent);
00727    if (status != BM_SUCCESS && status != BM_CREATED) {
00728       cm_msg(MERROR, "mdump", "bm_open_buffer, unknown buffer");
00729       goto error;
00730    }
00731    /* set the buffer cache size if requested */
00732    bm_set_cache_size(hBufEvent, 100000, 0);
00733 
00734    /* place a request for a specific event id */
00735    bm_request_event(hBufEvent, (WORD) event_id, (WORD) event_msk,
00736                     get_flag, &request_id, process_event);
00737 
00738    start_time = 0;
00739    if (speed == 1)
00740       printf("-%s -- Enter <!> to Exit ------- Midas Dump in Speed test mode ---\n",
00741              cm_get_version());
00742    else
00743       printf("-%s -- Enter <!> to Exit ------- Midas Dump ---\n", cm_get_version());
00744 
00745    /* connect to the database */
00746    cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, &hKey);
00747 
00748 
00749    {                            /* ID block */
00750       INT l = 0;
00751       memset((char *) eq, 0, 32 * sizeof(FMT_ID));
00752       /* check if dir exists */
00753       if (db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/equipment", &hKey) == DB_SUCCESS) {
00754          char strtmp[256], equclient[32];
00755          for (i = 0;; i++) {
00756             db_enum_key(hDB, hKey, i, &hSubkey);
00757             if (!hSubkey)
00758                break;
00759             db_get_key(hDB, hSubkey, &key);
00760             sprintf(eq[l].Eqname, key.name);
00761             /* check if client running this equipment is present */
00762             /* extract client name from equipment */
00763             size = sizeof(strtmp);
00764             sprintf(strtmp, "/equipment/%s/common/Frontend name", key.name);
00765             db_get_value(hDB, 0, strtmp, equclient, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
00766 
00767             /* search client name under /system/clients/xxx/name */
00768             /* Outcommented 22 Dec 1997 SR because of problem when
00769                mdump is started before frontend 
00770                if (status = cm_exist(equclient,FALSE) != CM_SUCCESS)
00771                continue;
00772              */
00773             size = sizeof(WORD);
00774             sprintf(strtmp, "/equipment/%s/common/event ID", key.name);
00775             db_get_value(hDB, 0, strtmp, &(eq[l]).id, &size, TID_WORD, TRUE);
00776 
00777             size = sizeof(WORD);
00778             sprintf(strtmp, "/equipment/%s/common/Trigger mask", key.name);
00779             db_get_value(hDB, 0, strtmp, &(eq[l]).msk, &size, TID_WORD, TRUE);
00780 
00781             size = sizeof(str);
00782             sprintf(strtmp, "/equipment/%s/common/Format", key.name);
00783             db_get_value(hDB, 0, strtmp, str, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
00784             if (equal_ustring(str, "YBOS")) {
00785                eq[l].fmt = FORMAT_YBOS;
00786                strcpy(eq[l].Fmt, "YBOS");
00787             } else if (equal_ustring(str, "MIDAS")) {
00788                eq[l].fmt = FORMAT_MIDAS;
00789                strcpy(eq[l].Fmt, "MIDAS");
00790             } else if (equal_ustring(str, "DUMP")) {
00791                eq[l].fmt = FORMAT_MIDAS;
00792                strcpy(eq[l].Fmt, "DUMP");
00793             } else if (equal_ustring(str, "ASCII")) {
00794                eq[l].fmt = FORMAT_MIDAS;
00795                strcpy(eq[l].Fmt, "ASCII");
00796             } else if (equal_ustring(str, "HBOOK")) {
00797                eq[l].fmt = FORMAT_MIDAS;
00798                strcpy(eq[l].Fmt, "HBOOK");
00799             } else if (equal_ustring(str, "FIXED")) {
00800                eq[l].fmt = FORMAT_MIDAS;
00801                strcpy(eq[l].Fmt, "FIXED");
00802             }
00803             l++;
00804          }
00805       }
00806 
00807       /* for equipment */
00808       /* check for EBuilder */
00809       if (db_find_key(hDB, 0, "/EBuilder/Settings", &hKey) == DB_SUCCESS) {
00810          sprintf(eq[l].Eqname, "EBuilder");
00811          /* check if client running this equipment is present */
00812          /* search client name under /system/clients/xxx/name */
00813          /* Outcommented 22 Dec 1997 SR because of problem when
00814             mdump is started before frontend 
00815             if (status = cm_exist(equclient,FALSE) != CM_SUCCESS)
00816             continue;
00817           */
00818          size = sizeof(WORD);
00819          db_get_value(hDB, hKey, "Event ID", &(eq[l]).id, &size, TID_WORD, TRUE);
00820 
00821          size = sizeof(WORD);
00822          db_get_value(hDB, hKey, "Trigger mask", &(eq[l]).msk, &size, TID_WORD, TRUE);
00823 
00824          size = sizeof(str);
00825          db_get_value(hDB, hKey, "Format", str, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
00826          if (equal_ustring(str, "YBOS")) {
00827             eq[l].fmt = FORMAT_YBOS;
00828             strcpy(eq[l].Fmt, "YBOS");
00829          } else if (equal_ustring(str, "MIDAS")) {
00830             eq[l].fmt = FORMAT_MIDAS;
00831             strcpy(eq[l].Fmt, "MIDAS");
00832          } else {
00833             printf("Format unknown for Event Builder (%s)\n", str);
00834             goto error;
00835          }
00836          l++;
00837       }
00838       /* Debug */
00839       if (debug) {
00840          i = 0;
00841          printf("ID\tMask\tFormat\tEq_name\n");
00842          while (eq[i].fmt) {
00843             printf("%d\t%d\t%s\t%s\n", eq[i].id, eq[i].msk, eq[i].Fmt, eq[i].Eqname);
00844             i++;
00845          }
00846       }
00847    }                            /* ID block */
00848 
00849    do {
00850       if (via_callback)
00851          status = cm_yield(1000);
00852       if (speed == 1) {
00853          /* calculate rates each second */
00854          if (ss_millitime() - start_time > 1000) {
00855             stop_time = ss_millitime();
00856             rate = count / 1024.0 / 1024.0 / ((stop_time - start_time) / 1000.0);
00857 
00858             /* get information about filling level of the buffer */
00859             bm_get_buffer_info(hBufEvent, &buffer_header);
00860             size = buffer_header.read_pointer - buffer_header.write_pointer;
00861             if (size <= 0)
00862                size += buffer_header.size;
00863             printf("Level: %4.3f %%, ", 100 - 100.0 * size / buffer_header.size);
00864             printf("Rate: %1.3f MB/sec\n", rate);
00865 
00866             start_time = stop_time;
00867             count = 0;
00868          }
00869       }
00870 
00871       /*  speed */
00872       /* check keyboard */
00873       ch = 0;
00874       if (ss_kbhit()) {
00875          ch = ss_getchar(0);
00876          if (ch == -1)
00877             ch = getchar();
00878          if ((char) ch == '!')
00879             break;
00880       }
00881    } while (status != RPC_SHUTDOWN && status != SS_ABORT);
00882 
00883  error:
00884    cm_disconnect_experiment();
00885 
00886    return 1;
00887 }
